# Preparation

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
rent = read.csv("data/cleaned_rent.csv")
```

## Data Cleansing

```{r}
rent$
```


# EDA

```{r}
str(rent)
```

## Station

```{r fig.width = 11, fig.height = 7}
rent %>% 
  ggplot(aes(station, fill = station)) +
  geom_bar(show.legend = FALSE) +
  theme_gray(base_family = "HiraKakuPro-W3") +
  coord_flip()
```

## Distance

```{r}
rent %>% 
  filter(methods == "徒歩") %>% 
  ggplot(aes(dis)) +
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 1)
```
